thread.title: Kristen Whittles
thread.title_full: 1StopMove Free Change of Address reviewed by Kristen Whittles

author: Kristen Whittles
title: Kristen Whittles
text: Changing my address with 1StopMove was a breeze! It was fast, easy, convenient, and more importantly, there weren't any fees!! Moving is expensive enough without having to pay some dot com to report a simple change of address for you and who has the time to stand in line at the post office for 20 minutes just to hand in a form that only took you 20 seconds to fill out?!?!? I only wish I had found 1StopMove sooner because I most definitely would have used their services for all my other moving needs!!
